Dust 2 is fun, make sure to always go to B bomb site and stand behind the crate in the corner, as no one expects it and you can easily get kills with the AUG like I did. Sometimes, some people will expect it, but they're just hacking. Have fun, make sure to keep an eye out for when you're the last person left, because they leave that up to you.
